export_info.status: COMPLETE - All structures and schemas extracted
export_info.note: Actual content data requires developer database access

treasures.description: Coach Training Program Resources - 'The Incredible Treasure'
treasures.access_rule: Must have access to Coach Training Programs (program_id IN [1, 6, 32, 39]) OR treasure access (program_id 31 or 38)

categories.title: Marketing & Promotions
categories.description: Marketing materials, promotional content, and sales resources for coaches

content_examples.title: Speak To A Fortune (Book)
content_examples.description: Arfeen's system teaching step-by-step how to become a highly-paid expert with books, blogs, speaking, seminars, coaching, and training.

content_examples.title: The Secrets Millionaire Blueprint (Book)
content_examples.description: Guide to achieving commercial, emotional, and spiritual success through perspective altering.

content_examples.title: Life lessons with Arfeen Khan
content_examples.description: Article from Filmfare - April 18, 2021. Over two decades of life-coaching experience helping 600,000+ people in 47+ countries.

content_examples.title: CTF Foundation X Event Coverage
content_examples.description: Asia's biggest global virtual 360 mega event coverage from BW BUSINESSWORLD - December 9, 2020.

bonuses.description: Client Program Bonuses - Unlockable content for enrolled clients

my_bonuses.description: Bonus content items linked to programs

bonuses.access_rule: Must be enrolled in the associated program (e.g., program_id = 11 for main client program)
bonuses.display_format: Carousel with owl-carousel, showing title, description, thumbnail, and download button

content_examples.title: Bonus Training Materials
content_examples.description: Additional training content unlocked upon enrollment

content_examples.title: Exclusive Video Content
content_examples.description: Premium video sessions available to enrolled clients

resource_center.description: STF Mastermind Resource Center - Additional resources for mastermind participants
resource_center.database_query: prg_marketing_mst WHERE treas_id = 6 OR id IN [15, 19]

personality_resources.description: Personality assessment resources available through treasure
personality_resources.personality_limit: Configurable per marketing item via personality_limit field

treasure_access.language_filter: Access filtered by program language (HINDI or ENGLISH)

from_database: prg_incredible_treasure - Full treasure category list with descriptions
prg_marketing_sub - Individual content items with video IDs and PDF links
prg_my_bonuses - All bonus items with download file lists

components_needed: TreasureHub - Main treasure landing page with category cards
DownloadButton - Handle download vs open functionality
react_implementation_notes.access_control: Check user program enrollments before displaying content
react_implementation_notes.file_handling: Server-side file serving with authentication checks
react_implementation_notes.carousel_library: Consider react-slick or embla-carousel as owl-carousel replacement
